trends: There has been one other sighting in Claremont
There were no other sightings in Claremont on or around April 22nd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsIn the begining I was looking through my telescope and then looked away and saw a bright red blue and white pulsating light hovering most likely 500ft or more over near Myrtle street. Ive seen a lot of UFO before and I wasnt shocked or scared. At the end before it vanished it literally jumped like 2 miles to the south west and then within three or four seconds it jumped back to where I originally saw it in the first place and then it kinda dimed down and to me vanished.
Summary: it was a Bright Blue, Red, and white pulsating light
